name: replaceItemAtURL(originalItemURL:withItemAtURL:backupItemName:options:)
desc: Replaces the contents of the item at the specified URL in a manner that ensures no data loss occurs.DeprecatedUse replaceItemAt(_:withItemAt:backupItemName:options:) instead.
declaration: func replaceItemAtURL(originalItemURL: NSURL, withItemAtURL newItemURL: NSURL, backupItemName: String? = nil, options: FileManager.ItemReplacementOptions = []) throws -> NSURL?
